General.Name: Xinjiang Yilite Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Yilite Industry Co.,Ltd research, develops, produces, and sells liquor in China. It is also involved in supply of heat production and thermal power generation. The company processes and sells agricultural and sideline products, as well as engages in water production and agricultural development services. In addition, the company produces and sells packaging materials, glass, mechanical, electrical, and chemical products. Xinjiang Yilite Industry Co.,Ltd was founded in 1956 and is based in Urumqi, China.
General.Address: Building A, Dacheng Erya, Xinyuan, China, 835811
